dict.acceptation: 榨取，汲取；轻轻地捏；向…勒索（或榨取）；
在强压下屈服；施加压力；挤过去；
挤压，压榨；抱紧，拥挤；拥挤的人群；<口>压力；

sent.orig: The smaller the squeegee angles is squeeze envirogluvtm squeeze too screen volume.
sent.trans: 刮印角越小被刮板挤压功丝网的油不朱度越众。

sent.orig: " If you have the time to squeeze me, why don't you squeeze Mr. Cao?"
sent.trans: “有工夫挤我，干吗不挤挤曹先生？”

sent.orig: Anglo-American markets will be worst affected by the credIt'squeeze.
sent.trans: 信贷市场将对英美市场造成的影响最为严重。

sent.orig: Warm Tips: Do not squeeze, puncture and bulge bag, please not edible.
sent.trans: 温馨提示：勿挤压，扎破、胀袋、漏气勿食用。

sent.orig: Squeeze them to make sure they're still pliable, ' not brittle.
sent.trans: 用手挤压一下，以确认软管仍柔韧而不脆裂。
